message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep the price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $120?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I need a bit more to make this work. I'm willing to come down to $125.  This is a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think.
